flawed_nl_solution:
Katrina has 85/5 = <<85/5=17>>17 marbles.
Twice as many marbles as Katrina is 17 x 2 = <<17*2=43>>43
Amanda has 43 -12 = <<43-12=31>>31 marbles.
Mabel has 85 - 31 = <<85-31=54>>54 more marbles than Amanda

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 43. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
